description: Rules for enforcing reusable components instead of raw HTML elements

rules.name: No raw button elements
rules.message: Use <Button> or <IconButton> component from @/shared/ui/Button instead of raw <button> elements

rules.name: No raw input elements
rules.message: Use <Input> component from @/shared/ui/Input instead of raw <input> elements (except hidden/file/checkbox/radio inputs)

rules.name: No raw select elements
rules.message: Use <Dropdown> component from @/shared/ui/Dropdown instead of raw <select> elements

rules.name: No raw textarea elements
rules.message: Use <Textarea> component from @/shared/ui/Textarea instead of raw <textarea> elements
